name: COWS | March 2023 ★ 𝓑𝓪𝓼e !
description:
Base made for YCHS, Adoptables, Commissions and personal use as always!♥

With the requested body types here on patreon and a lot of cool details to play with~ You can suggest more things you'd like me to add to the base for an extension or another version!

PSD AND PNG FILES, for mobile users and PC users!

  RULES  

  • You can edit the base.
  • Credit me if you use it.
  • YOU ARE ALLOWED TO do Adopts, Commissions and YCH COMMISSIONS!
  • Adopts and ychs can't be less than 3$ each! (you need to charge more than 3$ for your time and effort please!!!) ♥
  • DO NOT DELETE THE WATERMARK! Add yours too for the colors and edits on the base.
  • You can NOT re-sell the base!
  • Have fun!

EXTRA INFO: If you take commissions with this base please credit me. (NEVER REMOVE THE WATERMARK IN THE TOP LAYERS add yours with mine!).

You are not allowed to do extensions with this base.
